Index.title: Aura Peptides
Index.hero_subtitle: Precision-engineered lyophilized peptide for advanced laboratory research. The first triple-agonist (GLP-1, GIP, GCGR) available in a premium, verifiable format for the European market.
Index.section_science_desc: Engineered for researchers demanding the highest level of purity, accuracy, and absolute privacy across Europe.
Index.card1_desc: Every single batch is third-party tested with HPLC and Mass Spectrometry protocols to guarantee purity and detect endotoxins.
Index.card2_desc: Your privacy is our priority. We offer a 100% discreet, secure, and untracked fulfillment process, from confirmation to direct delivery.
Index.card3_desc: Dispatched from within the European Union. No customs delays, no import duties. Fast and stealthy courier delivery.
Index.footer_copy: © 2026 Aura Peptides Europe. For Research Purposes Only.
Index.footer_disclaimer: All products are sold strictly for laboratory research purposes only and are not intended for human consumption. Statements on this website have not been evaluated by any regulatory authority. Products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
Index.buyer_protection_desc: Every order is covered by our comprehensive protection policy. If your package is lost, seized by customs, or arrives damaged — we reship at no extra cost or issue a full refund. No questions asked.
Index.buyer_protection_item1: Free reship on lost or seized packages

Index.qa_step4_desc: Tested for contaminants and heavy metals
Index.qa_step5_desc: Full certificate published on product page
Index.why_item1_desc: Every batch tested by Janoshik with published COA — not just a claim, verifiable proof.
Index.why_item2_desc: Full GMP synthesis, sterility panels, and endotoxin screening. Lower prices elsewhere usually mean skipped steps.
Index.why_item3_desc: No customs, no seizure risk, no import duties. Shipped from within the EU with full tracking.
Index.why_item4_desc: Lost or seized? We reship free. 30-day satisfaction guarantee on every order. No questions asked.
Index.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know before ordering.
Index.faq_q1: Do your peptides contain fillers or additives?
Index.faq_a1: No. Our products contain pure active compounds only, with composition independently verified. No fillers, no binders, no undeclared ingredients. What's on the label is exactly what's in the vial.
Index.faq_q2: Do you ship to my country?
Index.faq_a2: We ship to all EU countries and select international destinations. All shipments include tracking, proper documentation, and customs-compliant labeling. Shipments originate from within the EU, eliminating customs risks for European researchers.
Index.faq_q3: How do you guarantee my privacy?
Index.faq_a3: Your security is paramount. All orders pass through offline encrypted gateways. We utilize stealth packaging with no external references to the contents.
Index.faq_a4: Orders confirmed before 12:00 PM (CET) are processed and shipped the same business day. You will receive a secure tracking email as soon as the package leaves logistics.
Index.faq_a5: You may request a cancellation as long as your order has not been shipped yet. Once a package has been dispatched, cancellation is no longer possible — but our Buyer Protection policy covers any delivery issues.
Index.faq_q6: What purity level do I need for my research?
Index.faq_a6: Research applications typically require 95-99%+ purity for reliable results. Lower purity can introduce variables that compromise data integrity. All our products meet the ≥99% standard, suitable for pharmaceutical-grade research protocols.
Index.faq_q7: Do you offer returns or exchanges?
Index.faq_a7: Due to the temperature-sensitive nature of research compounds, we do not accept returns. This policy exists to protect all customers — we guarantee that no previously shipped product is ever resold. If you receive a damaged or incorrect product, our Buyer Protection policy covers you fully.
Index.faq_q8: Are research peptides legal to purchase?
Index.faq_a8: Research peptides sold for laboratory use are legal to purchase in most jurisdictions when clearly labeled 'For Research Purposes Only.' Our products are not approved for human consumption. Regulations vary by location — verify your local requirements before ordering.
Index.faq_q9: Why do products say 'not for human consumption'?
Index.faq_a9: This disclaimer indicates our peptides are research-grade compounds intended for in-vitro laboratory applications. They have not been evaluated by regulatory authorities (FDA, EMA) for human safety or efficacy. We maintain strict regulatory compliance in all our operations.

Index.review_2_desc: "Finally a trustworthy vendor. The fact they post Janoshik results directly on the page saves me so much time. Reconstitutes perfectly clear every single time."
Index.review_3_desc: "Customer support is actually 24/7. Had an issue checking out, emailed them and got it sorted manually in 10 minutes. Top tier service."
